title: Face Unlock - only one allowed?
content: I am very disappointed that Pixel 4 Face Unlock only allows one face to be registered.  With my Pixel 3, I was able to add my wife's fingerprints (in addition to my own) so she could also quickly unlock my phone.  Please, add the ability to add a 2nd face.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
